tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** ******* **** ** *** **** ************* **** **** *** ** * **** ***** She is always friendly, thoughtful, and puts our concerns first. Awesome doctor! Has helped me so much with everything I have been through! Really efficient.

Not only has she taken great care of my health, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment. It‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient.

Dr. Smriti is indeed, the most treasured of the Doctors I have been privileged to meet.

It‚Äôs not only the good skills she has as a doctor but also the good heart, one that cares for others.

Her care really made me feel that I am in safe hands throughout my pregnancy.

Her personal touch and willingness to spend time with her patients explaining the situation is a welcome trait.

I feel most fortunate to have her as my gynaecologist.

She is kind of a person who tells you what is going on in regular language and not in "doctor talk".

Dr Smriti is genuinely blessed with the magical power to treat a life.

She made my journey of pregnancy stress free and a relaxed one.

Dr. Smriti‚Äôs presence holds positive vibes that is more powerful than any medicines.

Thank you doctor for the wonderful birthing experience, no words are enough to appreciate the service you do.

Your talent and caring manner is a credit to the medical profession.

We will continue to recommend you to all the couples who are planning for a baby.

We will keep you in Our prayers

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am petrified of needles surgery and pain. I put off going to the surgery 2 years after I got to know about the fibroid in me.  Finally not able to avoid it any more I reached out to Doctor smrithi at Aster.  I was totally surprised to find her so approachable, kind and reassuring.  I put to her countless questions which may have been very basic.  She answered every one of them with a smile. She explained the procedure I had to undergo patiently. She finally gave me her number to whatsApp questions if I could think of more so she could answer them. I was amazed and felt  very comfortable with her.  Scheduled my surgery ASAP.  Doctor Smrithi and Doctor Sunil Eshwar have done a wonderful job. I am now very happily recovering post surgery.  Having a reassuring smile a kind word and a confident demeanor works wonders when one is petrified and full of questions.  It is all we need to calm us down. I am very grateful and sincerely thank Doctor Smrithi and Doctor Sunil Eshwar for their support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Smrithi Mam,

Vaidyo Narayano Hari (‡≤µ‡≥à‡≤¶‡≥ç‡≤Ø‡≥ã ‡≤®‡≤æ‡≤∞‡≤æ‡≤Ø‡≤£ ‡≤π‡≤∞‡≤ø ) means "A doctor is equal to Lord Narayana".
I had read this sloka in books and heard many times from different people. But today, I experienced it.
To us, you‚Äôre a magician, a great doctor, a special gift from God. 

We took treatment for around 7 years in Belgaum, Hubli, Pune, Kolhapur, Sangli and met many doctors but it was not successful.
As a last try we met Dr.Sunil Eshwar sir and Dr Smrithi mam and in the first consultation felt postiveness, comfortness and confidence that we are in safe hands.

You proved that "Nothing is Impossible". Despite of having multiple complexities in pregnency, your expertiseness, proffessionalism and the way you handled our case made it Possible We are blessed with a healthy Baby boy.
You‚Äôve given us a new life. Thank you for your excellent treatment and also grateful for your friendly staff members.

*** *** *** **** ************** ************ ******** *********** ********** ** **** ***** *** **** a great human being....
 
‚ÄòTons of THANK YOU‚Äô

- Monika and Mahaveer M (Belgaum)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: ****** ******* ***** ** ** ********* *******I started my consultation from 4th week of my pregnancy. she explained complete process of next 9 months and how things will fold out. she spends good time clearing out doubts and make us comfortable. At the time of delivery too she was present till the end moments.doctor also is available in WhatsApp for clearing of any doubts.i highly recommend her. In Aster hospital sisters ancy lincy and jesty were very helpful.they helped from labor to post op recovery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Dr.Smrithi treated me not just like a Doctor. She was my mother, sister and I got a shoulder to share my sorrows. when I met maam, It was my 8 yr of wedding, but no kid, I had 3 miscarriages...i was experiencing the unhappy days in  my life...but once I started treatment under Dr.Smrithi my life changed.Now I'm experiencing and exploring my sweet motherhood with my son. She is a special Dr .with God's own hand. My friends are taking treatment with ma'am now and they  also so happy . Ton thanks to Dr.Smrithi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******* ** ** ********* *********** ****************. Her expert guidance & positive approach has helped us in every step of the way from conception to delivery. She takes the time to breakdown the diagnosis & treatment options in layman's terms and offers holistic medical advice which instils confidence in the patients. Her expert guidance has helped us conceive and navigate through a healthy pregnancy. I would strongly recommend her to any one struggling with fertility issues or just looking for an OBG who is approachable, non-judgmental and responsive. The entire OBG Department at Aster is also extremely warm and professional.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
" Hope , care , satisfactory treatment " is all you need as a patient from any doctor , Dr smrithi Nayak is the one who brings all to you .she has provided with the best pre and post pregnancy care  and management .
Being a high risk case of pregnancy with repeated abortions , there were zero hopes for me and my family. But all thanks to almighty God that i came across Dr smrithi Nayak.
I highly recommend her if you are specially s high risk case .**** *** **** ********* *** systematic management skills for pre pregnancy and post pregnancy treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.Smrithi D Nayak is really a wonderful doctor. She has got a very friendly nature. Explains the problem and it's solution thoroughly. I had got Laproscopic mayomectomy done which was taken care very well by her and the team of doctors. The entire team was very supportive. She takes atmost care of even the smallest problem of her patients and attends to it. Aster RV Hospital is well maintained and cleanliness is taken care well. I heartly thank her and the Team *** ***** ********* *** ** **** *************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ******* ** * **** **** *************. We got her reference 
from one of our friend and right now we are in a position to 
recommend her to others. She guided us right from day 1 and in each 
visit she was monitoring with care. We appreciate the way she explained all the trimisters and the scans required. Dr Smrithi went out of her way to reply our questions in whatsapp and assessed our lab test reports.
When we conveyed our plan to deliver in my wife's native she happily co-operated and was kind enough to give a letter which helped our travel in these tough covid times.

Me and my wife Shruthi extend our heartfelt namaskara to Dr Smrithi and
wish that more and more patients get benefitted from her expertise and treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Smrithi has been an incredible support during my pregnancy and continues to be one post pregnancy. The best thing about her is she has a very nice comforting vibe which is very rare. She is available on phone at the oddest of hours and has the patient's best interests at heart. She has always heard my numerous problems and concerns patiently and addressed it with a smile and genuineness. Dr. Smrithi has this ability to empathize with her patients and make them feel like they're talking to a friend. She explains the treatment plan - what is being done and why/why not. She is open to feedback which is not a quality which we come across very often. I feel really blessed that I found a doctor like her and recommend her wholeheartedly to everyone. *** ** ***** *** **** ****** **** **** ****** **** ****

review: I cannot say enough wonderful things about Dr.Smruthi D Naik. First of all, I think she is a brilliant Gynaecologists and Obstetricians. But, what really makes her stand out is how she made me feel like I was her only patient and that she would spend as much time with me as I needed. she was incredibly thought my pregnancy. I think the highest compliment one can give a doctor is that they treat a patient like a member of their family and Dr. Smruthi D Naik did that for me. I feel so lucky to have found her. Above all, she was very helpful to visit to hospital during late night as there was no fetus movement during 7th month. She spoke to me with lot of positive vibes and  observed me for 2-3 hours, finally everything was good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Had an amazing positive birthing experience under the guidance of Dr.Smriti and the Aster hospital team...we were confused on which doctor and where would we have our first delivery in Bangalore after all the research glad we came across Dr.Smriti . She indeed has been an awesome OBGYN.

She has such a positive aura around her and she   Was part of my pregnancy with a genuine concern for me and my baby.

During Covid times I have had the **** treatment and care and I couldn‚Äôt have asked for anything more

Thanks Doctor!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I started seeing her from very start of my pregnancy. Since it was my 1st pregnancy I had lots of questions which she answered in very friendly way.Her explanation eg which medicine she is giving and why everything so clear which I understand easily. In this covid situation since she is available in mobile no need to visit the hospital all the time which keep me safe too. I really feel I m in safe hands. She know what she is doing. She keeps me comfortable in every visit. Such a great decision I made to consult her. I will recommend to all. I still have long way to go in my pregnancy time and somewhere I am confident she will take care of me. Lots of love and wishes to her ‚ù§Ô∏è from me and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Initially we just went for pregnancy confirmation. But Doctor Smriti was very friendly and we were very much satisfied from her consultation. So we decided to continue pregnancy treatment with her. 
Her advice and follow up was very useful throughout my pregnancy period and she tried best possible way to get Normal delivery done for me. She was very much helpful during my delivery. 
We are very much happy and satisfied from Doctor Smriti‚Äôs pre and post pregnancy treatment and care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor smrithi is very friendly and caring . She addresses each and and every issue at the most priority .. she has been a great pillar through out my delivery and post recovery . I would highly recommend people out there to visit smrithi for any gynaec related issues .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had consulted Smriti madam for my second pregnancy from 6th month.I am very happy with the way she listens to her patient concerns and reply very politely. I recommend her for her good service, she was always available over phone for any concerns.She and her whole team really provided good care of me  and helped me in my smooth normal delivery. Thankyou ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
With Dr. Smrithi I was able to immediately form a bond. Her friendly and approachable nature helped. At each stage of my pregnancy I would ask so many questions and she would always answer patiently. 
During delivery also she tried her level best for a natural birth. For certain reasons natural didn't workout and we had to resort to C section. Finally baby and I were safe and good and that's what mattered most.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was my first visit to RV Hospital with Doctor Smirthi D Nayak . I must say that she is very great doctor. The way she explained us about our problems and give us hope. Very kind and friendly behaviour. I visited with my wife and she was also very comfortable to share her problem. We will continue our treatment. And we hope we will get the best result. Thank you so much Dr. Smirthi  üôÇ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Smrithi is a sweetheart **** ** ********* ************* *** yet very friendly and down to earth.
Her positivity is contagious 
She is also careful about NOT recommending unnecessary tests. 
She and her team took great care in pre op as well as post op.
Even today if I have a question, she is only a phone call away.
Great DOCTOR! Would recommend her highly.

*** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** She is extremely caring and friendly. She also is available all round the clock and replies to all my messages and queries. She is confident and gives the best advice for ailments. I am very happy with her treatment and will recommend this doctor for all gynecology problems.

She is really caring and takes care of her patients as of her own. Always available at critical times. When I was suffering from a miscarriage she was the one to rush to hospital in non working hours and made sure I‚Äôm alright. My family and I are very thankful to her for the kind of support and treatment given .

I really appreciate Dr.Smrithi, I am also very thankful  for her. She guided me through out my pregnancy. She explains will what ever the issue was and suggested how to go about it. Moreover she was friendly with me which helped me to come out of my feer about delivery...
reply_text: Thank you so much. I really  appreciate your kind words.

review: Dr. Smrithi is a very friendly and experienced doctor. She makes sure she is available for her patient at all times. She made me feel immediately comfortable and I was happy with my decision to consult her for my delivery. She did an excellent job and i had a normal delivery. I am so happy to have my baby girl in the best health and thankful to Dr. Smrithi for all her support and encouraging nature.
reply_text: Thank you so much Mrs Shruti
